vision.desc: To be the leading educational institution that inspires students to become confident, compassionate, and innovative leaders.

integrity.desc: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and ethical behavior in everything we do.

excellence.desc: Striving for the best results in academics, sports, and personal growth.

story.title: Our Story
story.desc: Excellence Academy began with a powerful vision to redefine learning.
story.growth: Over the past three decades, we have grown.

faq.q1: How can I get on the 'School Pride' list?
faq.a1: You need to have excellent grades in all subjects and actively participate in school life throughout the year.
faq.a2: Currently, we have sections for Call of Duty, CS2, and strategy analytics.
faq.q3: Is a special uniform required for military classes?
faq.a3: Yes, classes with Victor Nikolaevich require a camouflage uniform provided by the school.

event1.title: «School Masters» Tournament:
